body:
I don't think you have to select "under the top bar". Now I deselect all three and the view still presents fine.

This is a conversation about what extended edge is. Take a look.
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/26894642/what-is-the-extend-edge-property-in-uiviewcontroller-for
